attributes.action: Prevent excessive and un-necesary, often duplicated, teacher planning by publishing a national, centralised set of optional education plans and resources which teachers can access if they wish.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is literally hours and hours spent each weekend by thousands of teachers up and down the UK planning lessons for the forthcoming week. Much of this is duplicated and a central set of plans would prevent teachers having to ignore their partners and children whilst carrying out this meaningless admin. task, thus enabling them to return to work refreshed each Monday morning.
